publicationStmt.publisher: Yoav Cohen and Maya Ben Tov, Ben-Gurion University

lg.l: In the city no one knows your name. -- In the city, I’m so
Cause no one sees me when I go insane. -- Feeling freely,
climbing up into the sky. -- I will fly so high. -- Look below,
Kiss the sky, let the feeling flow, =-- Then go.
In the city, thought I heard you name. -- Loudly, clearly.., my
Cause you can see me, so you can take me there. -- Then you
don’t you want the same. -- To the sky we will fly so high.
Take a fall, it all seems so small. -- Feel the sky,
please don’t let me go. -- Giant blow, I thought I have seen
Feel the sky, please don’t let me go.
